item.title: Best way to create this site
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

OnlyOneRule:

a table is better for the layout, then if you want to do fancy stuff use a div inside the table to do it

Divs are just as good as tables for layouts. I find people who dislike divs are too lazy to try and make a website out of them and feel that presentation on few browsers and ease of creation is better than general compatibility with all kinds of browsers.

Tables are too inflexible to work with, not to mention they blatantly violate the principle of separating layout and content.
